name: Hemlibra
use: To prevent or reduce the frequency of bleeding episodes in adult and pediatric patients with hemophilia A who have developed antibodies called Factor VIII (FVIII) inhibitors

name: Mepsevii
use: To treat pediatric and adult patients with an inherited metabolic condition called mucopolysaccharidosis type VII (MPS VII)- also known as Sly syndrome.

name: Fasenra
use: For add-on maintenance treatment of patients with severe asthma aged 12 years and older- and with an eosinophilic phenotype

name: Prevymis
use: To prevent infection after bone marrow transplant

name: Vyzulta
use: To treat intraocular pressure in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.

name: Calquence
use: To treat adults with mantle cell lymphoma

name: Verzenio
use: To treat certain advanced or metastatic breast cancers

name: Solosec
use: To treat bacterial vaginosis

name: Aliqopa
use: To treat adults with relapsed follicular lymphoma

name: Benznidazole
use: To treat children ages 2 to 12 years old with Chagas disease

name: Vabomere
use: To treat adults with complicated urinary tract infections

name: Besponsa
use: To treat adults with relapsed or refractory acute lymphoblastic leukemia

name: Mavyret
use: To treat adults with chronic hepatitis C virus

name: Idhifa
use: To treat relapsed or refractory acute myeloid leukemia

name: Vosevi
use: To treat adults with chronic hepatitis C virus

name: Nerlynx
use: To reduce the risk of breast cancer returning

name: Tremfya
use: For the treatment of adult patients with moderate-to-severe plaque psoriasis

name: Bevyxxa
use: For the prophylaxis of venous thromboembolism (VTE) in adult patients hospitalized for an acute medical illness

name: Baxdela
use: To treat patients with acute bacterial skin infections

name: Kevzara
use: To treat adult rheumatoid arthritis

name: Radicava
use: To treat patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS)

name: Imfinzi
use: To treat patients with locally advanced or metastatic urothelial carcinoma

name: Tymlos
use: To treat osteoporosis in postmenopausal women at high risk of fracture or those who have failed other therapies

name: Rydapt
use: To treat acute myeloid leukemia

name: Alunbrig
use: To treat patients with anaplastic lymphoma kinase (ALK)-positive metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) who have progressed on or are intolerant to crizotinib

name: Brineura
use: To treat a specific form of Batten disease

name: Ingrezza
use: To treat adults with tardive dyskinesia

name: Austedo
notes: tetrabenazine already approved; this is the first deuterated approved drug
use: For the treatment of chorea associated with Huntington’s disease

name: Ocrevus
use: To treat patients with relapsing and primary progressive forms of multiple sclerosis

name: Dupixent
use: To treat adults with moderate-to-severe eczema (atopic dermatitis)

name: Zejula
use: For the maintenance treatment for recurrent epithelial ovarian, fallopian tube or primary peritoneal cancers

name: Symproic
use: For the treatment of opioid-induced constipation

name: Bavencio
use: To treat metastatic Merkel cell carcinoma

name: Xadago
use: To treat Parkinson’s disease

name: Kisqali
use: To treat postmenopausal women with a type of advanced breast cancer

name: Xermelo
use: To treat carcinoid syndrome diarrhea

name: Siliq
use: To treat adults with moderate-to-severe plaque psoriasis

name: Emflaza
notes: already generic in other countries; pricing speculation
use: To treat patients age 5 years and older with Duchenne muscular dystrophy (DMD)

name: Parsabiv
use: To treat secondary hyperparathyroidism in adult patients with chronic kidney disease undergoing dialysis

name: Trulance
use: To treat Chronic Idiopathic Constipation (CIC) in adult patients
